src:
A alma do negócio

07 Nov 2019, 08:28

Luciano Hang, dono da Havan, publicou nota anunciando que suspendeu a propaganda na Rede Globo.
Seus concorrentes devem estar festejando.
text:
The soul of business

07 Nov 2019, 08:28

Havan's owner Luciano Hang issued a note announcing that he suspended advertising on Rede Globo.
Your competitors must be partying.
